plot: ZOMBIE MURDER EXPLOSION DIE! guarantees each of the things in its title in every episode. The series follows five tech-addicted teens as they epic fail their way through a zombie apocalypse...
plot_en: ZOMBIE MURDER EXPLOSION DIE! guarantees each of the things in its title in every episode. The series follows five tech-addicted teens as they epic fail their way through a zombie apocalypse...
plot_es: ZOMBIE MURDER EXPLOSION DIE! guarantees each of the things in its title in every episode. The series follows five tech-addicted teens as they epic fail their way through a zombie apocalypse...
title: Zombie Murder Explosion Die!
